Written records: People would rely on written records, such as diaries, letters, and documents, to remember past events and people.
Audio recordings: People would listen to audio recordings of conversations, lectures, and events to remember past events and people.
Film and video footage: People would watch film and video footage of past events and people to remember them.
Physical objects: People would remember past events and people by looking at physical objects that were present at the time, such as photographs, awards, and keepsakes.
Technology: People would use technology, such as digital archives and databases, to remember past events and people.
